Name: smelting of copper concentrate, sulfide ore | copper, anode | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
Description: Based on the mix of smelter types in operation nationally in 2002; assumed here to represent the current smelter technology mix: Reverberatory furnace, 6.8%; Isasmelt–Peirce–Smith furnace, 46.6%; Noranda–Teniente furnace, 32.2%; and flash smelting, 14.5%.
